definition: sth that people like to chat about/topic of idle conversation
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Warm up by using your prepared conversation starters with the next person you see.
sentences.chinese: 用準備好的談資和你見到的下一個人進行談話。

sentences.english: I can only make some guesses, for the right to talk about funding.
sentences.chinese: 我在這裏也只能作一些臆測，權作談資。

sentences.english: Many stars will become dinner-party material of people.
sentences.chinese: 很多明星會成爲人們飯局的談資。
這個笑話成了茶餘飯後的談資。
